website_summaries.verdict: Biokleen's highly concentrated detergent goes a very long way.
pros: For those who are bothered by lingering detergent smells, Biokleen's light citrus scent lasts briefly
Some buyers say the whole bottle lasts them a year
And the detergent can get rid of the toughest stains, including cloth diaper stains
cons: May leave white residue on certain fabrics

website_summaries.verdict: Biokleen’s concentrated natural laundry detergent has a light citrus scent and no artificial fragrances, colors, or preservatives.
pros: Made in the U.S. Well liked for dealing with stains and soiled clothes
Nontoxic and made from plant-based surfactants, this container is designed to handle 300 high-efficiency loads (150 standard loads) without leaving a residue
cons: Some users don’t care for the lingering scent it leaves on clothes
Made using sulfate as a surfactant

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean well
customer_reviews.text: I repurchased this after using it a few years ago. I tried Seventh Generation and felt like it dried out and faded my clothes, even when using the right amount. Because of the EWG rating, I decided to give Biokleen a try. I couldn't remember what I did not like about it back then. Since it's such a great price (~$27/300 loads!), I thought I'd reevaluate. It doesn't get my clothes clean. I've used it with a standard washing machine and HE. The clothes end up having a funny, off-putting, musty smell that is unique to this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: anonymoz

customer_reviews.title: Clean, safe, ethical, effective.
customer_reviews.text: I have only come across a few stains(thread cutting oil) that this hasn't removed. Just like with any detergent, pretreat stains and you'll be fine. All I do is get dirty at work every day. Unless you're rolling around in lithium grease this product will work for you. If its not working, YOU are wrong! I like this product a lot. It doesn't harm my septic system either, doesn't put chemicals into the ground near my well, and isn't even really that expensive. I also like that it wasn't tested on animals!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans great! One big downside though
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this laundry detergent. It lasts forever! It gets my clothes clean and it is gentle enough to use on my baby's clothes without causing irritation to his delicate skin. Removed one star, however, due to white residue left on clothes sometimes. The residue is usually found on cotton/polyester blends- which unfortunately, is a lot of what my wardrobe is made up of.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids with eczema!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to leave this review to help other people, who are struggling with eczema, that this detergent really safe if you have skin problems. Initially, I switched to Biokleen line just for my daughter, who has eczema. And it worked great. Now all my laundry done with this product. In addition, I use oxyclean to fight bad odors from sweat or if possible, just soak clothes with Biokleen for a few hours, and then all odor is gone without oxyclean.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Lasted us almost 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I have a large capacity he washer and it works great in getting things clean. My laundry comes out clean and smelling really clean, not much of the lavender scent but just fresh. I have a family of six with 4 kids under the age of 10 so we have lots of laundry. One bottle lasted us almost 6 months. Update: If you have really stained clothes or a two year old toddler (like I do) that loves to wear his food on his clothes, you still need to pre treat that stuff (i.e. like things with red sauce and such). No detergent is a miracle worker when it comes to toddler food stains.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Clothes come out smelling bad like when they went in
customer_reviews.text: Well.... I gave it a try....with fingers crossed. This laundry soap is awful. Our clothes come out smelling as bad as when they went in. Stinky armpit, stinky sock scent on everything. Just gross! I was really hoping for more quality from Biokleen. I have liked other products from this company in the past. Don't waste your money. I have no idea what to do with whats left. Trash can i guess!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMa

customer_reviews.title: My new laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: Where has this product been hiding?!? I love the large size -up to 300 loads WOW my $26 purchase was an AWESOME deal. Scent is light but lasting. The cupful needed to wash is so tiny that this should last me a good 6mos. My laundry is clean and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. I will definitely be getting more in 6mos. This is my new laundry soap. Bottle came with tape to insure it didn't leak. Easy to pour spout. And good product for getting my clothes clean. No soapy residue & very pleased with amount needed to wash a full load.
customer_reviews.author: LLO

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent. You only have to use a tiny cap full and it really cleans the laundry. I was using ALL Unscented sensitive skin and my laundry half the time would come out with a bad smell and I would have to re wash it. I wanted something more natural and better for the money. I am glad I got this detergent. I will be a life time customer. My clothes come out smelling very clean, hardly any scent at all. Maybe a little lemon smell. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janice King

customer_reviews.title: Amazing-my favorite thus far!
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is absolutely amazing. I have a laundry monster in my house and I do at least 7 loads of laundry every week. This detergent lasts so long!! I am saving a ton of money and not poisoning the rest of my family with toxic chemicals. I am also pleasantly surprised at the fact that the clothes come out pretty clean. I do have to use stain remover on occasion, but this is so much better than other natural detergents I have used in the past!
customer_reviews.author: Ania Broz-St

customer_reviews.title: Healthier EWG verified detergent. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints so far. Only used on 3-4 loads so far, nothing to stained or crazy dirty. I use it on my childrens clothing. Scent is pleasant and not too strong. Barely noticeable after the wash. Gets everyday dirt and left over toddler messes out of the clothing just fine. Very happy with this purchase. This detergent is also EWG verified which is what led me to purchase. Looking to start buying healthier cleaning products.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Stick to Bac-Out
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this detergent. I use Bac-Out religiously as an add-in for my laundry - its the best product I've ever used for gnarly gym clothes funk (and I do a ton of hot yoga, so...I know my gym funk). I was surprised at how poorly this product worked. Regular washes (non-gym) often came out with odors. Lights and brights looked dingy. My wife bought her own laundry detergent to do her clothes separately halfway through the first bottle, I quit halfway through the second.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Too late to return, but I would if I could.
customer_reviews.text: If I could return this, I would. I didn't realize that it had SLS in it. That stuff is bad for you. Plant based doesn't mean safe. I'm still hunting for something that isn't even questionable in toxicity.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hamlett

customer_reviews.title: Love the detergent but not the bottle!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent. I've been looking for something cleaner, without so many additives, more natural and stumbled upon BioKleen, and love all the products so far. But the bottle is AWFUL. It's huge, which would be ok, except that the cap is situated sideways, which makes it near impossible to pour without spilling or contorting my body in order not to do so, which is very uncomfortable. Please fix your design!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Whelan

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my husband’s sensitive skin. Definitely works well. We have small kids and do tons of laundry- everything comes out clean!! Love than the cap is small so it helps with keeping amount of soap per load down. So many companies have huge caps that lead to using more product which means you’ll buy more, but it actually works against you and doesn’t clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: LW963

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Washing off tough stains and highly concentrated. I definitely recommend this detergent. I switched all my household detergents and softeners to natural products thinking about environmental health of our planet. But I didn't expect a great benefit that comes with this change: laundry machine became absolutely clean, disgusting smell and black mold buildup gone! Same story with dishwasher and dishwashing detergent. Popular brands like Tide, Cascade and other killing not only environment, but household machines too.
customer_reviews.author: Zetacat

customer_reviews.title: EWG-rated laundry detergent
customer_reviews.text: Although this detergent is slightly more expensive that other brands, it is EWG-rated, so this makes me feel better about using it for my family’s laundry, including clothing for my three-year-old daughter. With so much contact with skin, transference of toxic chemicals is a real risk, so I’m fine with spending the extra money. I do notice that it doesn’t work quite as well on stains and very dirty laundry than other detergents do, but I add a stain remover and it’s fine. The scent is very, very light and not really evident.
customer_reviews.author: natmillert

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Once our son was born we switched over to Molly Suds and Vinegar as a softener, and my husband has been kicking and screaming since. He hates how his clothes never seemed to be as "clean" as they were with the chemical laden stuff, which i refused to ever purchase again after reading whats in them!! (insert horrified face!) Well I am happy to report that this stuff is amazing! So glad we made the switch.. its gentle for my baby and it cleans our laundry really well!
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Does it Work? Not sure, but it has no scent
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how well this works. Our clothes are never incredibly soiled, but do they seem clean enough coming out of the wash? sure.. I really wish I could tell by smelling though. My husband refuses to use this detergent though because it has zero scent. Like even putting my nose directly into the jug, I can't smell anything. He refuses to believe clothes are clean unless they "smell clean"
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Not good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this because I like a lot of their other products but we all had terrible trouble with sensitive skin being bothered by this.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt clean well
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is just alright. It doesn't HAVE a strong smell and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin, but it doesn't clean very well. Many shirts have come out of the wash with oil spots they didn't have when they went in. I really wanted this to work but I plan on switching and maybe using this for delicates until it runs out
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleans really well even large loads with half a cap in high efficiency washers. I haven't had to wash any load more then once since I've started using this. To get your clothes extra clean just add a bit of vinegar to the wash, it works really well with this detergent.
customer_reviews.author: SarahTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: We tried hard to use clean products. Clean for us and the earth. We have loved this soap! Even as a family of 6, this so far has lasted us months. I like the it isn't scented and leaves our cleans feeling clean and without residue. Will continue to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great Natural Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I am big on safe ingredients but it has been tough finding a good cleaning detergent. This one makes the cut. It doesn’t have an overwhelming scent which is fine for my sensitive skin family. But it cleans. I do add baking soda to my wash but even without, this is good stuff and makes the cut on EWG, Healthy Living. I have tried them all, this is the BEST
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Not completely natural or good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I liked this at first and wish it worked out for me but it wasn’t gentle enough for my son’s sensitive skin. It’s definitely a step up from regular grocery store brands but it’s not as natural and safe as they want you to think and there are a few ingredients I looked up on ewg that are known for being skin irritants so I had to stop using this.
customer_reviews.author: MrsN

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for me.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for me. I was taking care of someone who had urinated on his bedding. I couldn’t get the odor out after three washings so I gave up. I found a great DIY on YouTube using Dr. Bronner’s, baking soda and Arm and Hammer Washing Soda. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Alikitty

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: The formula is very concentrated, so a small amount really does go a long way. I figured that out the hard way (needing to rinse a load because not all the suds rinsed clean). The scent is very mild, I can hardly smell it. It is not the worst detergent I've used, but it definitely is not going to be repurchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn P.

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well but doesn't have much of a scent
customer_reviews.text: The reason I bought this product was that it had no harmful chemicals in it. I was pleasantly surprised to see it ranked highly on EWG's website as well. It doesn't work quite as well at cleaning clothes as other products I've tried, but since we don't have too many stains or anything, it's been fine. I really wish the smell was more prevalent though. It's supposed to be citrus, but I can't smell a thing. I might buy later for our sheets and towels, but if I need to wash a load that's really dirty, I'll have to go back to another brand.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shellenberger

customer_reviews.title: This is the best laundry soap around!
customer_reviews.text: We have used Biokleen laundry soap for years! It has a wonderful fresh scent and does not make your clothes smell like those yucky dryer sheets. A bottle of this goes a long way! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: J Soltani

customer_reviews.title: great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this laundry detergent. It does not leave my front loader stinky. I am assuming that it because it doesn't have any fillers. I have three children and we live in the wood so there clothes get very dirty. It works great and I feel good about using it. It smells good but unfortunately the scent doesn't really stick to the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have used All for years. This seemed like such a good value (and it is!) I decided to try it out. I will get many more wash loads out of it because you use about 1/3 of the detergent that you use with the other brand names. And it gets the clothes clean! Will re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Hill

customer_reviews.title: Clean laundry
customer_reviews.text: Have been using biokleen for about two years and I like it very much. My clothes always come out clean and without any strong fragance smell like other detergents; I use the lavander one and the smell is very subtle, I don’t even notice it 99% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That itcis for sensitive skin my skin is not disturbed .
customer_reviews.text: Like that it is for sensitive skin but scented not only to bad but with sensitive skin they usually ate scent free.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth K.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Laundry Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I like the Biokleen laundry detergents and will spend the extra to use them. I think they get my clothes cleaner and I notice my clothes look nicer after they come out of the dryer. I think cheap detergents are made out of really crummy ingredients these days so I spend the extra. There are just two of us so it's not much money. I also don't use any detergents that do animal testing. The unscented Biokleen detergent is good too.
customer_reviews.author: KD from Missouri

customer_reviews.title: Works on cloth diapers and teen boy stinky clothes 😉
customer_reviews.text: Smell is nice and subtle. Clothes and even cloth diapers come out clean, even with our harder water here in Okinawa.
customer_reviews.author: PCO Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Good value and cleaning power
customer_reviews.text: This cleans the clothes and the suttle scent is good I like this company a little goes a long way use if u run out of dish liquid real plant soaps are gentle on the hands good for hand washing clothes . softness after they dry
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this product
customer_reviews.text: My wife has chemical allergies, so she a very difficult time finding health and beauty products that don't cause an allergic reaction for her. I'm happy to say this is the first detergent we have used that is gentle on her skin and still gets the laundry clean.
customer_reviews.author: Scott & Becky S

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a few years. It’s amazing. Removes stains. Subtle scent. Note: if you’re switching from Tide, like I did, it will take some time for the scent to be noticeable as the scent of Tide is extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best natural detergent
customer_reviews.text: Works better than Method, Seventh Gen, and ECOS. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Xatfam

customer_reviews.title: It Works And It’s Eco Friendly
customer_reviews.text: The Cap Fulls Are Pretty Small But Concentrated. 1 Cap Full Will Clean A Full Load Of Clothes, No Problem. If You Have Sensitive Skin, This IS The Product For You And The Fragrance (If Any) Isn’t Overpowering, So That Means You Can Wear Your Clothes Straight Out Of The Machine And Wont Have That “Hey, I Just My Clothes” Scent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The value for the $. WARNING A little goes a LONG way! I dont have an HE washer & it really doesnt take much to do a large load of laundry. I doubted the amount in the tiny cap & put more than suggested & it took 5 washed to get all that soap out LOL.
customer_reviews.author: VG L Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Concentrated mild soap
customer_reviews.text: A very little detergent cleans big loads well. Almost no scent, a real plus.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: It cleans well and is concentrated
customer_reviews.text: All my clothes get clean and stains are removed. I am switching to more natural cleaning products (I like their dishwasher soap a lot--dishes are clean, not filmy, and spot free) because we are on a well and septic system. It is so concentrated I use hardly any either.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Chalklady Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Less footprint and works just as good as the leading brands!
customer_reviews.text: It only takes a little bit. Works as good as the chemical products out there. I have found my laundry soap for life! Less of a footprint and safe for little ones!
customer_reviews.author: bainton2

customer_reviews.title: Lasted well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of it's amazing low rating on EWG website. I was amazed by how long it lasted. The scent was barely noticeable but it cleaned well. I would definitely buy this again and recommend it. The price would be the only reason I can't buy it too regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Treenz

customer_reviews.title: works good, and doesn't irritate my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous trying a new detergent, but this one works great. We usually try to get a natural detergent because half of our family has sensitive skin. This one worked really well and we have had no issues with irritation Even my toddler is fine with it
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L

customer_reviews.title: Really great wash
customer_reviews.text: Pro - easy to handle jug, small cap, washed great, feels very clean, adds softness, clothes look better than other detergents Con - not many scents and not a very strong scent
customer_reviews.author: brooke

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for cruelty free laundry soap and I found this. I absolutely love the smell and it works great. I’ve bought it twice now and I’m sure I’ll be buying it again in the future
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: We have gone through so many detergents that get an A rating on the ewg, and this is by far my favorite. It's great on stains and smells nice without being overpowering. I have been using it for a couple years now, we really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious shopper

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Works fine if you use a little more than recommended but I wish it made my clothes smell cleaner
customer_reviews.author: Meesha Evans

customer_reviews.title: FAVORITE NATURAL DETERGENT
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST LAUNDRY SOAP!!! I have used this product for years and feel great about using it for cleaning my family's clothes. I have tried many natural detergents and this is by far my favorite. This soap works wonderfully! I wash large loads, and usually use two capfulls to really get a good clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jones

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! Lasts a long time in my HE washing machine. I like a more natural alternative. Washes well. No strong scent left behind. We have this on our automatic order.
customer_reviews.author: Beaver Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Love using a natural detergent for myself and my dogs. Great value as I do a lot of washing. Have updated many of the cleaning products I use and pleased I chose this.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Erns

customer_reviews.title: Laundry det
customer_reviews.text: Product is probably good but leaked all over and box was wet.Don’t think I will purchase that size again and wasn’t packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: annchar

customer_reviews.title: I have to use more than 1 capful per load
customer_reviews.text: I have to use more than it says to feel that my clothes will come out clean. That said, I don't feel that I get the value for the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Oggie

customer_reviews.title: Clean laundry!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it had a good rating from EWG.org and I'm very happy with the results from the cleaning power and my laundry doesn't smell like anything but clean. It's good economically, I think it's 300 loads for about $26.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy and Marc

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job cleaning all items of laundry
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found a detergent.....No itchiness, redness, dryness to skin and scalp. Fresh and clean scent but not fake and chemically. Does a great job cleaning all items of laundry. A little product goes a long way! It also works well on pet beds etc, and my dog isn't scratching as much either!! I will continue using this product.
customer_reviews.author: CRTbird

customer_reviews.title: A Good Eco-Friendly Detergent for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I really like how this product cleans. I love that it’s eco-friendly. It has a nice, soft scent, but I would prefer something that leaves a little more scent to the clothing. It’s not a bad price for the product, but it could be a few bucks cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be doing a fine job getting clothes clean
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be doing a fine job getting clothes clean, smells fresh without being overpowering (unnoticeable on clothes post-wash), and love that we are cutting down our chemical usage in the home. Lasts a long time, but the bottle is super heavy and awkward at first! Will gladly buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong but still cost effective!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this, however all our clothing and towels were smelling musty so I’ve started sprinkling “washing soda” over the top of my load before I start it and that seems to help. I will probably still repurchase so to the cost and low toxicity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times, very happy with the results. Washes great, clothes smell fresh and clean. Love that it's natural. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: Safe detergent that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy to have found a detergent with an “A” rating from the EWG that actually works! I use a half cap in every normal size load and the clothes always come out clean and smelling fresh. Also the bottle lasts forever!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Schuber

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Scent and Clean Clothes!
customer_reviews.text: Two caps in my wash with cold water and it makes everything sooo soft and clean. Used this for almost 12 years now. Have yet to find another that works as well. My family has sensitive skin also... this is the best for us!
customer_reviews.author: erika

customer_reviews.title: Great, crisp, clear, low scent detergent
customer_reviews.text: It's my absolute favorite detergent, with the slightest, almost non-existent, citrus scent that I love, given that I don't care for strong artificial scents.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great for clothes AND cloth diapers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent SOOO much! Will never switch to anything else. My family has sensitive skin so I wanted something gentle, but also something that is effective for cloth diapering. We use this with all of our clothes, bedding, and diapers. It lasts for months and gets fabrics clean, without building up residues (which is important for the absorbency of cloth diapers). 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Used  for 3 years still amazed!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for 3 years now and I'm still amazed at how new my clothes continue to look. I'll never go back to those name brand detergents again! I'm using an all natural and environmentally responsible product! There hasn't been a stain that this hasn't gotten out yet. With teenage boys that says a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Travis H.

customer_reviews.title: This is good.
customer_reviews.text: This is good but I've been putting three lid fulls per load. This goes in with my regular laundry detergent. : )
customer_reviews.author: Electric Apes a Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome detergent !!!
customer_reviews.text: This detergent is AWESOME !!! It's cruelty free which is very important to me and it works like a charm. It is very economical because you only use such a small amount. Everything comes you of my machine clean !!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Taylor

customer_reviews.title: half cap clearly not enough
customer_reviews.text: Direction say 1/2 cap for HE washers. I washed a half full load with 1/2 cap and items came out with body order still intact. I recommend using at least a full cap and suggest the company recommend the same.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Zuffi

customer_reviews.title: This product is full of toxins not “clean” at all!
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be all natural but it’s full of nasty ingredients. Sodium laurel sulphate a known carcinogen is one of its main ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Tara R.

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been my whole life!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Half a cap for a load of laundry! Where has this been my whole life! Best part my husband is allergic to most other brands so it's hard to find brands that don't irritate his skin and this doesn't!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Clothes are clean and smell great. It's nice to only use a tiny amount with each load and not pay for a bunch of extra water in the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dax

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly
customer_reviews.text: I love the light citrus scent and how clean my clothes feel afterwards. I especially love that there are no artificial chemicals or scents in it.
customer_reviews.author: AlliCat0420

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: We don’t use fabric softener in our house or like scents. This stuff leaves the clothes softer and softer with each wash and leaves no scent behind. Cleans well and the bottle lasts forever. Been using for 2 months for our family of 9. Doesn’t remove grease but other than that, no complaints at all. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working good. I’ve been using it for over a month now. It saves money and I feel good about its ingredients. My son has sensitive skin and it works great for him. The smell is light and once the laundry is done there is no smell. Some stains I have had to wash over again but not many. I will but again.
customer_reviews.author: Skog2010

customer_reviews.title: Careful with shipping
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, but now its happened twice: the bottle opens in shipping. This means there is about a gallon of soap spilled in the mail. This ruins everything else in the package, as well as all of our neighbors' mail. Cancelling my subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H

customer_reviews.title: Smelly clothes and towels
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but I noticed my clothes and towels were getting smelly. They were getting a musty, mildewy odor. Had to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cloth diapers.
customer_reviews.text: Way praying when I ordered this that it would work as good as the shop club detergent I was using and it totally does. I love this detergent. It works wonders on my cloth diapers in hard (sulfer) water, I even cut out a full wash cycle when we switched to this. Fantastic!! I tell all my family and cloth diapering friends!! Will buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Super effective
customer_reviews.text: Used this for years and love it! With small kids it gets out stains, cleans cloth diapers well, and lasts a long time. On ewg it gets an “A.”
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: best smelling detergent ever, recommend to everyone i know
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's plant based and the citrus oils they use are great and I love that the company has been in the same family for some generations and it's a husband and wife duo working together to run it. Also, it smells even better when you dry the clothes with the basil-scented Mrs. Meyer's dryer sheets.
customer_reviews.author: AndEls

customer_reviews.title: 100% clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as Tide on our laundry. Smells nice. Prefer it to Tide and other conventional brands because all of Biokleen's ingredients are non-toxic. From a clean living perspective, perhaps the best laundry soap available. Well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Theophrastus

customer_reviews.title: Biokleen is great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for general and special care laundry. I have an eczema reaction to some of the preservatives in some products. This one does not have those in it. My clothes come out clean and with just a hint of citrus. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: janice

customer_reviews.title: Really does a great job, exceptional efficiency.
customer_reviews.text: I use this in our combo washer dryer unit, using a 1/4 of the cup. It cleans very well, and smells perfect, not overbearing, but not underwhelming to the point that you worry it's not clean. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Young

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff lasts forever and works great. I'm on my third or fourth bottle now. I am very scent sensitive, and this lemon scent is not too strong. I will continue using as long as I can get it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Clean
customer_reviews.text: Lasts forever! I got this before Christmas, and my family of 4 is still on the same bottle! I love that all that clean is jam packed in the tiny amount you have to use :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect because perfumes/artificial fragrances are a problem in my household causing respiratory issues. Everything comes out clean and the citrus scent is extremely mild. Will buy this again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes and cloth diapers
customer_reviews.text: After washing clothes and cloth diapers with Biokleen they come out smelling fresh without a strong scent and very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love bio clean products!
customer_reviews.text: I found a bio clean years ago when I was a massage therapist. People were complaining that the oil I was using wood stain their shirt collars. It also stained my sheets. If you put this bio clean detergent on a stain and let it soak before the wash, it will get it out. This bio clean detergent is allI use now. I trust it for all of my laundry for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Grace

customer_reviews.title: Product is great. Packaging...not so much.
customer_reviews.text: About 1/4 of the bottle leaked out because it was placed in a box on it's side without shrink wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby H

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: We use this to wash the towels at our barbershop. We do about 2 loads a day, so the large size lasts a long time, the towels come out clean and soft, and there is not a strong scent. We are very happy with the product and the quick delivery through Prime. We will likely continue to use Biokleen Natural Laundry Detergent going forward.
customer_reviews.author: Beards and Brews

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have a VERY sensitive skin and very few detergents work for me, but this one does. Clothes come out clean and smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: User 1213

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed
customer_reviews.text: Washed two loads and both the machine overloaded with suds that flooded the floor. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt524

customer_reviews.title: Bottle arrived with hole
customer_reviews.text: Product itself met my expectations. The scent is subtle which I like. However, as others have mentioned, the bottle itself is problematic. Mine arrived with a hole which caused it to leak everywhere. I'd love to buy this again, but if I keep getting soapy boxes, I'm not sure I will.
customer_reviews.author: jworl

customer_reviews.title: Am able to use a small amount for an HE machine
customer_reviews.text: Just follow the instructions on the container. It seems to get my clothes clean. No problems. Only takes a half of cap full. Very little.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: I finally found a detergent I love!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this laundry detergent twice and don't plan on trying any other brand. I'm satisfied! One bottle lasted me just under 6 months and that is SO much more economical than anything I've bought and used from one of our local stores. I like a cleaner with a fresh scent and this has that as well. Just an overall great product! Don't change a thing!!
customer_reviews.author: angie crow

customer_reviews.title: BEST LAUNDRY DETERGENT!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 HIGHLY sensitive people in our family. We have tried a lot of different detergents and they either don’t clean your clothes or cause reactions from smells! But Biokleen really worked on CLEANING our clothes while not giving my child an asthma attack or rash. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Kyleigh Webb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent job cleaning clothes even with mineral oil on them
customer_reviews.author: Shanna E

customer_reviews.title: Effective cruelty free detergent
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cruelty-free and vegan laundry detergent I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent. Not a string scent.
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry detergent. And accidentally bought the citrus scent and it’s not overwhelming at all and also hasn’t bothered my very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: lkronmiller

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good natural detergent. Scent not strong. I work in landscaping so my clothes are very dirty. I soak my clothes for a bit in the washer before I make it go a full cycle.They come out clean for me. Big bottle and lasts a while. I have added it to my subscribe and save.
customer_reviews.author: Jawayne

customer_reviews.title: (I hate hugging people and smelling detergent and softeners - it ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this in conjunction with their Oxygen Bleach Plus - my clothes, animals towels and blankets and my scrubs come out very clean without an overpowering smell! (I hate hugging people and smelling detergent and softeners - it is VERY unhealthy)
customer_reviews.author: LB

product_meta.title: Biokleen Natural Laundry Detergent Liquid - 300 Loads 150 Fl Oz - Eco Friendly Non-Toxic Plant Based Safe for Kids and Pets No Artificial Colors or Preservatives
product_meta.description: Size:150 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Combines the natural cleaning power of plant-based surfactants with extracts of citrus and grapefruit seed for a clean that won't let you or your clothes down. Rinses clean and is gentle enough for delicate fabrics and your loved ones. Contains no - metasilicate.
feature_bullets: Cleans tough stains and odors and leaves no residue or harsh scent
150 ounce bottle is truly 3x concentrated and equal to 300 HE Loads/150 Standard Loads
Eco-Friendly, Non-Toxic, Plant-Based, No Artificial Fragrance, Colors or Preservatives
Contains grapefruit-seed and orange extracts; 100% free of metasilicates, borax, or caustics
Kind to those with chemical sensitivities and allergies. Contains no phosphate
No negative effects on rivers, streams, plants or wildlife
